code: export const deleteProduct=function(storeName,key){let version=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:1;return new Promise(resolve=>{const request=indexedDB.open("myDB",version);request.onsuccess=()=>{const db=request.result;const tx=db.transaction(storeName,"readwrite");const store=tx.objectStore(storeName);const res=store.delete(key);res.onsuccess=()=>{resolve(true);};res.onerror=()=>{resolve(false);};};});};
